title: Letcho (Hungarian sausage and pepper casserole)
ingredients: ['oil for fying', '3 onions, sliced into half-moons', '2 red peppers, cut into short strips', '1 yellow pepper, cut into short strips', '1 green pepper, cut into short strips', '3 cured or smoked sausages', '400g tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tablespoons ketchup', '1 tablespoon sweet paprika', 'salt and pepper to taste']
